fundCard.closed: (Closed, share value is based on the last value from 25.02.2022. Current value is unknown.)

subscription.settingsDescription: Below you can copy the fund's account number and your own reference number or create a virtual barcode to be entered in the online bank.
subscription.summaryDescription:
Copy the barcode below provided on the online banking payment form.

The name of the recipient of the fund must be added separately.

a.title: Accumulation units
a.description: Dividends or interest received by the fund are added to the fund capital and increase the value of the fund unit. The tax effect only arises when the fund units are sold.

b.title: Income units
b.description: Dividend or interest income is distributed once a year to unit-holders.

nonSubscribableFund.description:
OMX Helsinki 25 is an Exchange Traded Fund (ETF) and it cannot be subbscribed to like our other 'regular' funds.

Fund units are traded on the Helsinki Stock Exchange like stocks.

More information about Exchange Traded Funds can be found from:

meetingTimes.bookTimeDescription:
Would you like to discuss investing or financial management with us, either over the phone or in the form of an appointment?

You can make an appointment below.

Start by choosing a date and time for your appointment.

Please also tell me how many people are coming and what the subject of the meeting will be.

datePicker.title: Date time picker
datePicker.noAppointment: There is no available meeting for this day

meetingCreatedDialog.title: Your reservation has been saved
meetingCreatedDialog.info1: The recipient of the reservation will confirm the booking on their own behalf and will ask for further information if necessary.
meetingCreatedDialog.info2: Personal confirmation will normally be received no later than the working day following the booking.
meetingCreatedDialog.info3: If you do not receive confirmation or have questions, you can also contact us directly by email: info@seligson.fi.

newMeeting.title: Contact information
newMeeting.noAvailableTime: No available meeting times for the selected date.

settingsScreen.loginRequired: Biometric authentication and PIN-code are not available until you login.

usernameAndPassword.title: Username and password
usernameAndPassword.description: You will login with username and password

pin.title: Pin-code
pin.description: You stay logged in but you have to open the application with pin-code of your choosing.

biometric.title: Biometric authentication
biometric.description: You stay logged in but you have to open the application with fingerprint or facial recognition.

strongAuth.title: Strong authentication
strongAuth.description: You will login with strong authentication

demo.title: Demo
demo.description: You will be redirected to demo login

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Your portfolio will be shown when you login.

funds.title: Fund values
funds.description: Funds will be shown when you login.
